title: Worker Nodes
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has the required worker nodes configuration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_info; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } const apiOutput = clusterStep.data; try { if (!apiOutput.node_type_id) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Cluster response is missing node type information', code: 'INVALID_RESPONSE_FORMAT', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } const nodeTypeMatches = apiOutput.node_type_id.toLowerCase().includes('e32ds_v5'); let workerCountCorrect = false; let actualWorkerCount = 0; if (apiOutput.num_workers !== undefined) { actualWorkerCount = apiOutput.num_workers; workerCountCorrect = apiOutput.num_workers === 8; } else if (apiOutput.autoscale && apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers !== undefined) { actualWorkerCount = apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers; workerCountCorrect = apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers === 8; } if (nodeTypeMatches && workerCountCorrect) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Cluster has the required 8 x E32ds_v5 worker nodes', code: 'CORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } else { let message = 'Cluster worker configuration does not meet requirements:'; if (!nodeTypeMatches) { message += ' Node type is not E32ds_v5;'; } if (!workerCountCorrect) { message += ' Worker count is ' + actualWorkerCount + ' instead of 8;'; } return { status: 'fail', message: message, code: 'INCORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } } catch (error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Error processing cluster data: ' + error.message, code: 'PROCESSING_ERROR', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes' }; } }
